Html:
Hello. I have created an airplane navigation application using win forms Gmap. Now I want to use this application in a tablet. So had some questions.

-Do I just use a windows 8 tablet and run this win form application on it or would it be better to recreate the application using win mobile gmap?

-If I recreate the program using win mobile Gmap, how difficult/different would it be going from win form gmap?

Thanks
it's the same windows forms but for compact framework, works on windows mobile <= 6.5
